meanings.definition: A person who presides over a meeting or organization.
meanings.sent1: The prezes of the club welcomed everyone to the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The prezes of the student council made important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The prezes of the chess club always makes sure the pawns are in order.
meanings.sent4: She was like the prezes of the playground, organizing games and activities.
meanings.sent5: The prezes of the book club ensured that every member had a chance to speak.

meanings.definition: To act as the president or leader of a company or organization.
meanings.sent1: He will prezes the company's board meeting next week.
meanings.sent2: She prezes the team with confidence and efficiency.
